course_title: Seminar: Health Law, Bioethics, and the President's Commission for the Study of Bioethical Issues
class_notes: Students must complete the Preselection form to be considered for this class
course_description: In this seminar, we will read and analyze the various white papers created by the President's Commission for the Study of Bioethical Issues. Topics include: the intersection of neuroscience, ethics and society; public health planning and response; pediatric medical countermeasures; privacy and progress in whole genome sequencing; protecting participants in human subjects research; and more.
sections: Class Nbr: 5254, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 9-11a, Instructor: I. Bedzow, Status: Open
